verses.text: \w Now|strong="H0935"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w*, \w while|strong="H5750"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w shut|strong="H6113"\w* \w up|strong="H0935"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w*; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w strong|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w helpers|strong="H5826"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.

They \w were|strong="H1144"\w* armed \w with|strong="H0068"\w* \w bows|strong="H7198"\w*, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w were|strong="H1144"\w* able \w to|strong="H0251"\w* send \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* \w from|strong="H0068"\w* \w the|strong="H0251"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, \w with|strong="H0068"\w* \w right|strong="H3231"\w* \w hand|strong="H3231"\w* or \w left|strong="H8041"\w*: they \w were|strong="H1144"\w* Saul's \w brothers|strong="H0251"\w*, \w of|strong="H0251"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

\w Ahiezer|strong="H0295"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* their \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*, \w then|strong="H7218"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w*, \w the|strong="H3058"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shemaah|strong="H8094"\w* \w the|strong="H3058"\w* \w Gibeathite|strong="H1395"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeziel|strong="H3149"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Pelet|strong="H6404"\w*, \w the|strong="H3058"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Azmaveth|strong="H5820"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Beracah|strong="H1294"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w the|strong="H3058"\w* \w Anathothite|strong="H6069"\w*;

\w And|strong="H1368"\w* \w Ishmaiah|strong="H3460"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gibeonite|strong="H1393"\w*, \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w great|strong="H1368"\w* \w man|strong="H1368"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*, \w and|strong="H1368"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* chief; \w and|strong="H1368"\w* Jeremiah \w and|strong="H1368"\w* Jehaziel \w and|strong="H1368"\w* Johanan \w and|strong="H1368"\w* Jozabad \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Gederathite;
Eluzai \w and|strong="H3414"\w* Jerimoth \w and|strong="H3414"\w* Bealiah \w and|strong="H3414"\w* Shemariah \w and|strong="H3414"\w* Shephatiah \w the|strong="H3414"\w* Haruphite;
Elkanah \w and|strong="H3406"\w* Isshiah \w and|strong="H3406"\w* Azarel \w and|strong="H3406"\w* Joezer \w and|strong="H3406"\w* Jashobeam, \w the|strong="H8203"\w* Korahites;
\w And|strong="H0511"\w* Joelah \w and|strong="H0511"\w* Zebadiah, \w the|strong="H0511"\w* sons of Jeroham of Gedor.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Gadites, siding \w with|strong="H4480"\w* David, went \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* strong place \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* waste land, great \w and|strong="H1121"\w* strong \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, trained \w for|strong="H4480"\w* war, expert \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* use \w of|strong="H1121"\w* arms, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* faces \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* faces \w of|strong="H1121"\w* lions, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* they \w were|strong="H1121"\w* quick-footed \w like|strong="H1121"\w* roes \w on|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* mountains;
Ezer \w their|strong="H5921"\w* chief, Obadiah \w the|strong="H6440"\w* second, Eliab \w the|strong="H6440"\w* third,
Mishmannah \w the|strong="H0446"\w* fourth, Jeremiah \w the|strong="H0446"\w* fifth,
Attai \w the|strong="H3414"\w* sixth, Eliel \w the|strong="H3414"\w* seventh,
Johanan \w the|strong="H0447"\w* eighth, Elzabad \w the|strong="H0447"\w* ninth,
Jeremiah \w the|strong="H3076"\w* tenth, Machbannai \w the|strong="H3076"\w* eleventh.

These Gadites were captains \w of|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3414"\w* army; \w the|strong="H3414"\w* least \w of|strong="H3414"\w* them \w was|strong="H3414"\w* captain over a hundred men, \w and|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3414"\w* greatest over a thousand.

\w It|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H0259"\w* \w they|strong="H0428"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* went \w over|strong="H7218"\w* Jordan \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w first|strong="H0259"\w* month, \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* river \w was|strong="H0259"\w* overflowing, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* put \w to|strong="H1121"\w* flight \w all|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* valleys, \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* east \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* west.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* \w some|strong="H0428"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* children \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Benjamin \w and|strong="H0853"\w* Judah \w came|strong="H4217"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* David \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* strong \w place|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0935"\w*, \w If|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* peace \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w give|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* help, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* heart \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* united \w with|strong="H0935"\w* yours; \w but|strong="H0935"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w give|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w would|strong="H1732"\w* \w take|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* life, though \w my|strong="H1732"\w* hands \w are|strong="H1121"\w* clean \w from|strong="H4480"\w* wrongdoing, \w then|strong="H0935"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* God \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H4480"\w* fathers \w see|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* punishment.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* spirit \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* Amasai, \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* chief \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* captains, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w We|strong="H0518"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* yours, \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w we|strong="H0518"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* side, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* son \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Jesse: \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w helpers|strong="H5826"\w*; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w helper|strong="H5826"\w*. \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* army \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* captains \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* band.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* some \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Manasseh \w came|strong="H3847"\w* \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* went \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Philistines \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* war \w against|strong="H5973"\w* Saul, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* \w help|strong="H5826"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* lords \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Philistines, \w after|strong="H3588"\w* discussion, \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w away|strong="H5973"\w*, saying, \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* go back \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w master|strong="H5414"\w* Saul, \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* price \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* lives.

\w Then|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w back|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Ziklag, there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w men|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, Adnah \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Jozabad \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Jediael \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Michael \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Jozabad \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Elihu \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Zillethai, \w captains|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* thousands \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* armies \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* gave David help \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* armed \w bands|strong="H7218"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H0505"\w* great \w men|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* war, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w captains|strong="H7218"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* army.

\w And|strong="H1732"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* day \w to|strong="H1961"\w* day \w more|strong="H5921"\w* supporters \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, till \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H1368"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* God.

These \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* numbers \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* chiefs \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* armed \w men|strong="H1419"\w*, ready \w for|strong="H3588"\w* war, \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* Hebron, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w give|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Saul \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* hands, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w had|strong="H0430"\w* said.

\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H0428"\w* six thousand, eight hundred spearmen \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Judah, \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w war|strong="H6635"\w*;

Seven \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Simeon, great \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w war|strong="H6635"\w*;
\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Levi, four \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, six \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Jehoiada, chief \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w family|strong="H0505"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H4480"\w* \w three|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, seven \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*;

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* Zadok, \w a|strong="H7651"\w* young man, great \w and|strong="H3967"\w* strong \w in|strong="H5973"\w* war, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* twenty-two captains \w from|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H5973"\w* father's people.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w children|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Benjamin, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* brothers \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Saul, three thousand; \w for|strong="H1004"\w* up \w to|strong="H0001"\w* \w that|strong="H1004"\w* \w time|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H6659"\w* greater part \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H0001"\w* \w had|strong="H0001"\w* been true \w to|strong="H0001"\w* Saul.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim, twenty \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, eight hundred great \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* war, \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* great name \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* \w families|strong="H0505"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* half-tribe \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Manasseh, eighteen \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, \w listed|strong="H8034"\w* \w by|strong="H8034"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w came|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w make|strong="H8034"\w* David king.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Issachar, \w there|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w two|strong="H2677"\w* hundred chiefs, men \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* expert knowledge \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* times \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* best \w for|strong="H1732"\w* Israel \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w do|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H0505"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* brothers \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w under|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* orders.

\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* Zebulun, \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* fifty thousand \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* went \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* army, expert \w in|strong="H5921"\w* ordering \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fight, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* give help \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* sorts \w of|strong="H1121"\w* arms; true-hearted \w men|strong="H1121"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* Naphtali, \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* captains \w with|strong="H3627"\w* thirty-seven \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* spearmen.

\w And|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* Danites, twenty-eight \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, six hundred, expert \w in|strong="H5973"\w* ordering \w the|strong="H5973"\w* fight.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Asher, forty \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w who|strong="H4421"\w* went \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w with|strong="H4421"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w army|strong="H4421"\w*, expert \w in|strong="H4421"\w* ordering \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w fight|strong="H4421"\w*.

\w From|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* other side \w of|strong="H6635"\w* Jordan, there \w were|strong="H4421"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* hundred \w and|strong="H3318"\w* twenty \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* Reubenites \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* Gadites \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w men|strong="H6635"\w* \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* half-tribe \w of|strong="H6635"\w* Manasseh, \w armed|strong="H4421"\w* \w with|strong="H4421"\w* every sort \w of|strong="H6635"\w* instrument \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, expert \w in|strong="H6635"\w* ordering \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fight|strong="H4421"\w*, came \w to|strong="H4480"\w* Hebron \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w full|strong="H3605"\w* purpose \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w making|strong="H3605"\w* David king \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H4421"\w*; \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Israel|strong="H4421"\w* \w were|strong="H3383"\w* united \w in|strong="H6635"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* desire \w to|strong="H4480"\w* make David king.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* three days \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, feasting \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* table, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* brothers \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* ready food \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.
